summary: Comprehensive testing completed for BaseVault DeFi dashboard. All major features working correctly including admin authentication, vault CRUD operations, and frontend-backend integration.

minor_bugs.issue: Create vault returns status 200 instead of 201

passed_tests: Homepage renders with hero section and navigation
Vaults page loads with stats cards and filters showing 1 active vault
Admin panel displays existing vault correctly
Vault detail page shows metrics, addresses, and Web3 integration
Metrics refresh functionality updates TVL/APY with mock data
Admin logout functionality works and protects routes
Backend API endpoints return correct data
Vault creation via API working (creates vault successfully)
Network switch UI visible (shows Base Mainnet)
Connect Wallet button present for Web3 functionality
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix: Update vault creation endpoint to return 201 status code instead of 200 for RESTful compliance
